name: Seonte AI Content and SEO
author: Seonte

sections.description:
This plugin provides you way of creating automated AI content based on one or more keywords. First you generate one ore more titles based on a keyword that it is editable (that is initially the site’s name) and then the plugin creates a new article post, with the help of openai.com API, one per day for example taking one title from the list of titles that was created previously.

The user must submit his own openai.com API key in order that the plugin will be functionable.

Requirements

openai.com API key of the user it’s needed as described also more above.

Features

Free Version Features:

1) Automatically generate article posts using OpenAI’s AI through API integration.
2) Set a custom word count for each generated article post.
3) Detect duplicate titles to avoid posting the same AI-generated article with the same title.
4) A wizard with basic steps to create the foundation of a new website.
5) Generate articles with AI-generated images.
6) Option to insert additional AI images within the article content, aside from the featured image.
7) Set a maximum limit on the number of articles generated per day.
8) Control the speed of article generation, with intervals ranging from 1 minute to 4 hours.
9) Option to publish generated articles retroactively for natural content distribution.
10) Automatically assign existing categories to each article during AI generation, with AI assistance.
11) Use AI to moderate spam comments and respond to legitimate ones automatically.
12) Rotate WordPress admin users as authors for AI-generated articles.
13) Automatically display a table of contents with links for each AI article.
14) Present AI articles in well-formatted HTML with appropriate headings.
15) Automatically generate internal links for each new AI-generated article.

You can buy the PRO Version from our website: https://www.seonte.com/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the AI Content Creator -> “Settings” screen to make all the setting of the plugin.
  4. Then go to AI Content Creator -> “AI Content Creator” to start generate titles for articles.
sections.faq:
What is SEONTE AI Content and how does it work?

SEONTE AI Content is a WordPress plugin that automates content creation using AI while integrating SEO features to optimize your posts for search engines. It helps you generate high-quality content quickly with built-in SEO best practices.

Can I customize the content generated by SEONTE AI?

Yes, SEONTE AI allows you to review and customize the content it generates. You can easily edit, tweak, and improve the AI-generated text to better fit your brand’s tone and style.

Does the plugin include SEO optimization features?

Yes, SEONTE AI Content PRO Version includes SEO features such as automated SEO-friendly internal links, helping you rank higher on search engines.

Is SEONTE AI suitable for all types of websites?

Absolutely! Whether you run a blog, an eCommerce site, or a business website, SEONTE AI can generate relevant content for different industries and niches. The only condition is for you to run a WordPress Site.

Do I need any coding knowledge to use SEONTE AI?

No, SEONTE AI is designed to be user-friendly and doesn’t require any coding knowledge. It’s easy to install, activate, and start generating content.

Can SEONTE AI generate content in multiple languages?

Yes, SEONTE AI supports multiple languages, allowing you to create content in various languages depending on your target audience.

Does SEONTE AI Content support content scheduling?

Currently, SEONTE AI the PRO version generates content on demand, but it can be paired with WordPress’s native scheduling feature to publish content automatically at your preferred times.

Is there a limit to how much content SEONTE AI can generate?

The plugin may have limitations based on the API usage or plan you are using, but generally, you can generate as much content as needed depending on the AI model’s quota.

Will the content generated by SEONTE AI pass plagiarism checks?

SEONTE AI strives to create unique and original content. However, we recommend running the generated content through plagiarism detection tools for added assurance. In any case, in general, the AI content is original and unique.

How often is SEONTE AI Content updated?

We regularly update SEONTE AI Content to ensure compatibility with new WordPress versions, introduce new features, and improve performance. Stay tuned for plugin updates in your WordPress dashboard.
